CAS- 8(4)/2013/Div-I (Vehicle)
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION)
‘A’ WING, JANPATH BHAWAN
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001
Date: 08/04/2013
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.: 02 /2013
Subject:
Vehicle facility from VIP parking area to tarmac and vice-versa at
airports in respect of Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of
Parliament, Lok Sabha.
Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament, Lok Sabha permitted
for airport ferry vehicle facility from VIP parking area to tarmac and vice-versa
at all Airports in the Country for a period of Six months with immediate effect
on medical grounds.
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).
(Raja Srivastava, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Distribution as per list attached/overleaf.
Copy to:
MCA (Shri U.K. Bhatia, U/Secretary), R.R. Bhawan, New Delhi. : w.r.t. MCA
letter dated 14/03/2013.
